atk-s0305a11:3_0: 1071. Saccasaṁyuttassa paṭhame samādhiṁ, bhikkhaveti te kira bhikkhū cittekaggatāya
atk-s0305a11:3_1: parihāyanti, atha nesaṁ satthā – “evamete cittekaggataṁ labhitvā, kammaṭṭhānaṁ vaḍḍhetvā,
atk-s0305a11:3_2: visesaṁ pāpuṇissantī”ti imaṁ desanaṁ ārabhi. Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, “idaṁ dukkha”nti
atk-s0305a11:3_3: yogo karaṇīyoti ettha yathābhūtādivasena kāraṇacchedo veditabbo. Idañhi vuttaṁ hoti
atk-s0305a11:3_4: – bhikkhave, yasmā samāhito bhikkhu cattāri saccāni yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, tasmā tumhehi
atk-s0305a11:3_5: ca samāhitehi catunnaṁ saccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānanatthāya “idaṁ dukkha”nti yogo
atk-s0305a11:3_6: karaṇīyo. Tathā yasmā cattāri saccāni tathāgatasseva pātubhāvā pākaṭāni honti, yasmā
atk-s0305a11:3_7: ca tathāgatena suvibhattāni, yasmā ca tesu aparimāṇā vaṇṇā aparimāṇāni padabyañjanāni,
atk-s0305a11:3_8: yasmā ca tesaṁ appaṭividdhattā vaṭṭaṁ vaḍḍhati, tesaṁ paṭividdhakālato paṭṭhāya na
atk-s0305a11:3_9: vaḍḍhati, tasmā “evaṁ no vaṭṭaṁ na vaḍḍhissatī”ti tumhehi “idaṁ dukkha”nti yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0305a11:7_0: 1073-75. Tatiye abhisamayāyāti abhisamayatthāya. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti cettha sāsanāvacarā
atk-s0305a11:7_1: adhippetā. Tathā catutthapañcamesu, tena tena abhilāpena bujjhanakānaṁ pana ajjhāsayenetāni vuttāni.
atk-s0305a11:9: 1076. Chaṭṭhe abhisambuddhaṁ pakāsesunti abhisambuddho ahanti evaṁ attānaṁ abhisambuddhaṁ pakāsayiṁsu. Imasmiñhi sutte sabbaññubuddhā ca samaṇagahaṇena gahitā.
atk-s0305a11:11_0: 1080. Dasame anekavihitanti anekavidhaṁ. Tiracchānakathanti aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṁ
atk-s0305a11:11_1: tiracchānabhūtaṁ kathaṁ. Rājakathantiādīsu rājānaṁ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā
atk-s0305a11:11_2: dhammāsoko evaṁ mahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena pavattakathā rājakathā. Esa nayo corakathādīsu.
atk-s0305a11:11_3: Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā nayena gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā
atk-s0305a11:11_4: hoti. “Sopi nāma evaṁ mahānubhāvo khayaṁ gato”ti evaṁ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve
atk-s0305a11:11_5: tiṭṭhati. Coresupi “mūladevo evaṁ mahānubhāvo meghamālo evaṁ mahānubhāvo”ti tesaṁ
atk-s0305a11:11_6: kammaṁ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā. Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu
atk-s0305a11:11_7: “asukena asuko evaṁ mārito evaṁ viddho”ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā,
atk-s0305a11:11_8: “tepi nāma khayaṁ gatā”ti evaṁ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti. Apica
atk-s0305a11:11_9: annādīsu “evaṁ vaṇṇavantaṁ gandhavantaṁ rasavantaṁ phassasampannaṁ khādimha bhuñjimha
atk-s0305a11:11_10: pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti kāmassādavasena kathetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṁ pana katvā
atk-s0305a11:11_11: “pubbe evaṁ vaṇṇādisampannaṁ annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ sayanaṁ mālaṁ gandhaṁ vilepanaṁ
atk-s0305a11:11_12: sīlavantānaṁ adamha, cetiye pūjaṁ akarimhā”ti kathetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a11:12_0: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṁ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā, “pubbe mayaṁ evaṁ vicitrehi
atk-s0305a11:12_1: yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṁ na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṁ pana katvā “tepi
atk-s0305a11:12_2: no ñātakā khayaṁ gatā”ti vā, “pubbe mayaṁ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā
atk-s0305a11:12_4: sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṁ assādavasena vattuṁ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṁ pana katvā “saddhā
atk-s0305a11:12_5: pasannā”ti vā, “khayaṁ gatā”ti vā vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a11:13_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena vattuṁ na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā
atk-s0305a11:13_1: khayaṁ gatā”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Sūrakathāpi “nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī”ti
atk-s0305a11:13_2: assādavasena vattuṁ na vaṭṭati, “saddho pasanno ahosi, khayaṁ gato”ti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a11:13_3: Surākathātipi pāṭho. Sāpi cesā surākathā “evarūpā nāma surā pītā ratijananī hotī”ti
atk-s0305a11:13_4: assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, ādīnavavasena pana “ummattakasaṁvattanikā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0305a11:13_6: vāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā assādavaseneva vattuṁ na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā khayaṁ
atk-s0305a11:13_7: gatā”ti eccevaṁ vaṭṭati. Kumbhaṭṭhānakathāti udakatitthakathā vuccati, kumbhadāsikathā
atk-s0305a11:13_8: vā. Sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṁ gāyituṁ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā”tiādinā nayeneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a11:14_0: Pubbapetakathāti atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo. Nānattakathāti
atk-s0305a11:14_1: purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā. Lokakkhāyikāti
atk-s0305a11:14_2: “ayaṁ loko kena nimmito, asukena nāma nimmito, kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṁ setattā, balākā
atk-s0305a11:14_3: rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā. Samuddakkhāyikā
atk-s0305a11:14_4: nāma “kasmā samuddo sāgaro, sāgaradevena khanitattā sāgaro, khato meti hatthamuddāya
atk-s0305a11:14_5: niveditattā samuddo”ti evamādikā niratthakasamuddakkhāyikakathā. Iti bhavo iti abhavoti
atk-s0305a11:14_6: yaṁ vā taṁ vā niratthakakāraṇaṁ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā. Ettha ca
atk-s0305a11:14_7: bhavoti sassataṁ, abhavoti ucchedaṁ. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti kāmasukhaṁ,
atk-s0305a11:14_8: abhavoti attakilamatho. Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṁ bāttiṁsa
atk-s0305a11:14_9: tiracchānakathā nāma honti. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a11:18_0: 1081. Dutiyassa paṭhame bārāṇasiyanti evaṁnāmake nagare. Isipatane migadāyeti isīnaṁ
atk-s0305a11:18_1: patanuppatanavasena evaṁladdhanāme migānaṁ abhayadānavasena dinnattā migadāyasaṅkhāte
atk-s0305a11:18_2: ārāme. Ettha hi uppannuppannā sabbaññuisayo patanti, dhammacakkappavattanatthaṁ nisīdantīti
atk-s0305a11:18_3: attho. Nandamūlakapabbhārato sattāhaccayena nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitā anotattadahe
atk-s0305a11:18_4: katamukhadhovanādikiccā ākāsena āgantvā paccekabuddhaisayopettha otaraṇavasena patanti,
atk-s0305a11:18_5: uposathatthañca anuposathatthañca sannipatanti, gandhamādanaṁ paṭigacchantāpi tatova
atk-s0305a11:18_6: uppatantīti iminā isīnaṁ patanuppatanavasena taṁ “isipatana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0305a11:19_0: Āmantesīti dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrento anupubbena
atk-s0305a11:19_1: pacchimabhave katābhinikkhamano anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṁ patvā tattha aparājitapallaṅke
atk-s0305a11:19_2: nisinno mārabalaṁ bhinditvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṁ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṁ
atk-s0305a11:19_3: visodhetvā pacchimayāmāvasāne dasasahassilokadhātuṁ unnādento sabbaññutaṁ patvā satta
atk-s0305a11:19_4: sattāhāni bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā mahābrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0305a11:19_5: lokaṁ voloketvā lokānuggahena bārāṇasiṁ gantvā pañcavaggiye saññāpetvā dhammacakkaṁ
atk-s0305a11:20_0: Dveme, bhikkhave, antāti dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā. Imassa pana padassa saha samudāhārena
atk-s0305a11:20_1: samudāhāranigghoso heṭṭhā avīciṁ upari bhavaggaṁ patvā dasasahassilokadhātuṁ pattharitvā
atk-s0305a11:20_2: aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṁyeva samaye aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno samāgacchiṁsu, pacchimadisāya
atk-s0305a11:20_3: sūriyo atthameti, pācīnadisāya āsāḷhanakkhattena yutto puṇṇacando uggacchati. Tasmiṁ
atk-s0305a11:20_4: samaye bhagavā imaṁ dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṁ ārabhanto “dveme, bhikkhave, antā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0305a11:21_0: Tattha pabbajitenāti gihisaṁyojanaṁ chinditvā pabbajjupagatena. Na sevitabbāti na
atk-s0305a11:21_1: vaḷañjetabbā. Yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti yo ca ayaṁ vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa
atk-s0305a11:21_2: anuyogo. Hīnoti lāmako. Gammoti gāmavāsīnaṁ santako. Pothujjanikoti andhabālajanena
atk-s0305a11:21_3: āciṇṇo. Anariyoti na ariyo na visuddho na uttamo na vā ariyānaṁ santako. Anatthasaṁhitoti
atk-s0305a11:21_4: na atthasaṁhito, hitasukhāvahakāraṇaṁ anissitoti attho. Attakilamathānuyogoti attano
atk-s0305a11:21_5: kilamathassa anuyogo, attano dukkhakaraṇanti attho. Dukkhoti kaṇṭakāpassayaseyyādīhi
atk-s0305a11:22_0: Paññācakkhuṁ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī. Dutiyapadaṁ tasseva vevacanaṁ. Upasamāyāti kilesūpasamatthāya.
atk-s0305a11:22_1: Abhiññāyāti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ abhijānanatthāya. Sambodhāyāti tesaṁyeva sambujjhanatthāya.
atk-s0305a11:22_2: Nibbānāyāti nibbānasacchikiriyāya. Sesamettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ siyā, taṁ heṭṭhā tattha
atk-s0305a11:22_3: tattha vuttameva. Saccakathāpi sabbākāreneva visuddhimagge vitthāritā.
atk-s0305a11:23_0: Tiparivaṭṭanti saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇasaṅkhātānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ parivaṭṭānaṁ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:23_1: Ettha hi “idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, idaṁ dukkhasamudaya”nti evaṁ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtaṁ
atk-s0305a11:23_2: ñāṇaṁ saccañāṇaṁ nāma. Tesuyeva “pariññeyyaṁ pahātabba”nti evaṁ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṁ
atk-s0305a11:23_3: kiccañāṇaṁ nāma. “Pariññātaṁ pahīna”nti evaṁ tassa tassa kiccassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṁ
atk-s0305a11:23_4: katañāṇaṁ nāma. Dvādasākāranti tesaṁyeva ekekasmiṁ sacce tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ākārānaṁ vasena
atk-s0305a11:23_5: dvādasākāraṁ. Ñāṇadassananti etesaṁ tiparivaṭṭānaṁ dvādasannaṁ ākārānaṁ vasena uppannañāṇasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0305a11:23_6: dassanaṁ. Dhammacakkhunti aññattha tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni dhammacakkhu nāma honti,
atk-s0305a11:24_0: Dhammacakketi paṭivedhañāṇe ceva desanāñāṇe ca. Bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa hi catūsu
atk-s0305a11:24_1: saccesu uppannaṁ dvādasākāraṁ paṭivedhañāṇampi, isipatane nisinnassa dvādasākārāya
atk-s0305a11:24_2: saccadesanāya pavattitaṁ desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkaṁ nāma. Ubhayampi hetaṁ dasabalassa
atk-s0305a11:24_3: ure pavattañāṇameva. Imāya desanāya pakāsentena bhagavatā dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ
atk-s0305a11:24_4: nāma. Taṁ panetaṁ dhammacakkaṁ yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi
atk-s0305a11:24_5: saddhiṁ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti, tāva naṁ bhagavā pavatteti nāma, patiṭṭhite ca
atk-s0305a11:24_6: pavattitaṁ nāma. Taṁ sandhāya pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā
atk-s0305a11:25_0: Tattha bhummāti bhūmaṭṭhakadevatā. Saddamanussāvesunti ekappahāreneva sādhukāraṁ
atk-s0305a11:25_1: datvā – “etaṁ bhagavatā”tiādīni vadantā anusāvayiṁsu. Obhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇobhāso.
atk-s0305a11:25_2: So hi tadā devānaṁ devānubhāvaṁ atikkamitvā virocittha. Aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍaññoti
atk-s0305a11:25_3: imassapi udānassa udāhāranigghoso dasasahassilokadhātuṁ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a11:27_0: 1089. Navame aparimāṇā vaṇṇāti appamāṇāni akkharāni. Byañjanāti tesaṁyeva vevacanaṁ,
atk-s0305a11:27_1: vaṇṇānaṁ vā ekadesā yadidaṁ byañjanā nāma. Saṅkāsanāti vibhattiyo. Ekamekasmiñhi
atk-s0305a11:27_2: sacce sabbākārena vitthāriyamāne vaṇṇādīnaṁ anto nāma natthi. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0305a11:29_0: 1090. Dasame sabhāvāvijahanaṭṭhena tathaṁ. Dukkhañhi dukkhameva vuttaṁ. Sabhāvassa
atk-s0305a11:29_1: amoghatāya avitathaṁ. Na hi dukkhaṁ adukkhaṁ nāma hoti. Aññabhāvānupagamena anaññathaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:29_2: Na hi dukkhaṁ samudayādibhāvaṁ upagacchati. Samudayādīsupi eseva nayoti.
atk-s0305a11:33: 1091. Tatiyassa paṭhame ananubodhāti ananubujjhanena. Appaṭivedhāti appaṭivijjhanena.
atk-s0305a11:37: 1097. Sattame tasmā ariyasaccānīti yasmā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyānaṁ saccānīti vuccanti. Na hi vitathāni ariyā ariyasaccato paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0305a11:39: 1098. Aṭṭhame tathāgato ariyo, tasmā “ariyasaccānī”ti yasmā ariyena tathāgatena paṭividdhattā desitattā ca tāni ariyasantakāni honti, tasmā ariyassa saccattā ariyasaccānīti attho.
atk-s0305a11:41: 1100. Dasame sahañcaniketi sahañcaniyanagare. Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatītiādi ekapaṭivedhavasena vuttaṁ, imasmiñhi sutte ekapaṭivedhova kathito.
atk-s0305a11:45: 1101. Catutthassa paṭhame yadidaṁ uparīti yāni imāni upari. Sīsapāvaneti sīsapārukkhe.
atk-s0305a11:47: 1102. Dutiye anabhisameccāti ñāṇena anabhisamāgantvā, appaṭivijjhitvāti attho.
atk-s0305a11:49_0: 1103. Tatiye asmā lokā paraṁ lokanti imamhā manussalokā paraṁ nirayampi, tiracchānayonimpi,
atk-s0305a11:49_1: pettivisayampi, manussalokampi, devalokampi, gacchanti, punappunaṁ vaṭṭasmiṁyeva
atk-s0305a11:51: 1105. Pañcame evañcetaṁ, bhikkhave, assāti, bhikkhave, evaṁ ce etaṁ bhaveyya, nirantaraṁ sattisatehi haññamānassa dukkhadomanassehi sahevesa saccābhisamayo bhaveyya ceti attho.
atk-s0305a11:53: 1109. Navame mukhaṁ olokentīti ajjhāsayaṁ olokenti. Ajjhāsayo idha mukhanti adhippeto.
atk-s0305a11:55_0: 1110. Dasame silāyūpoti silāthambho. Soḷasakukkukoti soḷasahattho. Soḷasakukkūtipi
atk-s0305a11:55_1: pāṭho. Heṭṭhā nemaṅgamāti heṭṭhā āvāṭaṁ paviṭṭhā. Aṭṭha kukku uparinemassāti aṭṭha
atk-s0305a11:55_2: hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā bhaveyyuṁ. Bhusāti balavatī. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a11:59_0: 1111. Pañcamassa paṭhame sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyāti evaṁnāmikāya pokkharaṇiyā. Lokacintaṁ
atk-s0305a11:59_1: cintentoti, “kena nu kho candimasūriyā katā, kena mahāpathavī, kena mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0305a11:59_2: kena sattā uppāditā, kena pabbatā, kena ambatālanāḷikerādayo”ti evarūpaṁ lokacintaṁ cintento nisīdi.
atk-s0305a11:60_0: Vicetoti vigatacitto vikkhittacitto vā. Bhūtaṁyeva addasāti te kira asurā sambarimāyaṁ
atk-s0305a11:60_1: samparivattetvā yathā ne so puriso hatthiassādīsu āruhante ukkhipitvā, bhisamuḷālacchiddehi
atk-s0305a11:60_2: pavisante passati, evaṁ adhiṭṭhahiṁsu. Taṁ sandhāya satthā “bhūtaṁyeva addasā”ti
atk-s0305a11:60_3: āha. Devānaṁyeva mohayamānāti devānaṁ cittaṁ mohayantā. Tasmāti yasmā lokacintaṁ
atk-s0305a11:62: 1112-13. Dutiye paṭibhānakūṭoti eko mahanto pabbatasadiso mariyādapāsāṇo. Tatiye aniṭṭharūpanti aniṭṭhasabhāvaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:64: 1114. Catutthe heṭṭhimaṁ gharaṁ akaritvāti thambhabhittipādussāpanādinā gharassa heṭṭhimabhāgaṁ akatvā.
atk-s0305a11:66_0: 1115. Pañcame santhāgāreti sippuggaṇhanasālāyaṁ. Upāsanaṁ karonteti kaṇḍakhipanasippaṁ
atk-s0305a11:66_1: karonte. Asanaṁ atipātenteti kaṇḍaṁ atikkamente. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti ekaṁ kaṇḍaṁ khipitvā
atk-s0305a11:66_2: yathā assa sarassa poṅkhaṁ vijjhati, aparaṁ anupoṅkhaṁ nāma dutiyassa poṅkhaṁ, puna
atk-s0305a11:66_3: aparaṁ tassa poṅkhanti evaṁ atipātente addasa. Yatra hi nāmāti ye nāma. Durabhisambhavataranti
atk-s0305a11:66_4: dukkarataraṁ. Sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti ekaṁ vālaṁ
atk-s0305a11:66_5: sattadhā bhinditvā, tassa ekaṁ bhedaṁ gahetvā, vātiṅgaṇamajjhe bandhitvā, aparaṁ
atk-s0305a11:66_6: bhedaṁ kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiyaṁ bandhitvā, usabhamatte ṭhito kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyā taṁ
atk-s0305a11:66_7: vātiṅgaṇabaddhakoṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā evaṁ duppaṭivijjhāni cattāri saccāni, tasmā.
atk-s0305a11:68: 1117. Sattame aññamaññakhādikāti aññamaññaṁ khādanaṁ. Dubbalakhādikāti balavantehi macchādīhi dubbalānaṁ macchādīnaṁ khādanaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:70_0: 1118. Aṭṭhame mahāpathavīti cakkavāḷagabbhantarā mahāpathavī. Adhiccamidaṁ, bhanteti
atk-s0305a11:70_1: idaṁ adhiccuppattikaṁ sace taṁ yugaṁ na pūti bhaveyya, samudde udakaṁ na susseyya,
atk-s0305a11:70_2: so ca kacchapo na mareyya, api nāma yadicchāvasena siyāti attho.
atk-s0305a11:71_0: Evaṁ adhiccamidaṁ, bhikkhaveti ettha mahāsīvatthero cattāri yugāni dasseti – puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṁ
atk-s0305a11:71_1: ṭhitena purisena pakkhittayugassa hi chiggaḷena tassa andhakacchapassa gīvāya pavesanaṁ
atk-s0305a11:71_2: viya manussapaṭilābho adhiccapaṭilābhī. Dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṁ ṭhitena pakkhittassa
atk-s0305a11:71_3: pana paribbhamantassa purimayugaṁ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari āruḷhassa chiggaḷena
atk-s0305a11:71_5: ṭhitena pakkhittassa pana paribbhamantassa purimayugadvayaṁ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari
atk-s0305a11:71_6: āruḷhassa chiggaḷena gīvappavesanaṁ viya tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa dīpanaṁ
atk-s0305a11:71_7: adhiccatarasambhavaṁ. Uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṁ ṭhitena pakkhittassa pana paribbhamantassa
atk-s0305a11:71_8: purimayugattayaṁ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari āruḷhassa chiggaḷena gīvappavesanaṁ
atk-s0305a11:71_9: viya catusaccapaṭivedho ativiya adhiccatarasambhavo veditabbo. Navamādīni abhisamayasaṁyutte vuttanayānevāti.
atk-s0305a11:77: 1133. Āmakadhaññapeyyāle ariyena paññācakkhunāti vipassanaṁ ādiṁ katvā lokiyalokuttarena ñāṇacakkhunā.
atk-s0305a11:79_0: 1134.Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratāti ettha surā nāma piṭṭhasurā, odanasurā,
atk-s0305a11:79_1: pūvasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṁyuttāti pañcavidhā. Merayaṁ nāma pupphāsavo,
atk-s0305a11:79_2: phalāsavoti, evaṁ vutto yo koci āsavo. Majjanti tadeva ubhayaṁ, yaṁ vā panaññampi
atk-s0305a11:79_3: surāsavavinimuttaṁ madanīyaṁ. Yāya cetanāya taṁ pivanti, sā pamādassa kāraṇattā pamādaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a11:81: 1136-37.Matteyyāti mātuhitā, mātari sammāpaṭipannāti attho. Petteyyādīsu pituhitā petteyyā.
atk-s0305a11:83: 1138-39. Samaṇānaṁ hitā sāmaññā. Brāhmaṇānaṁ hitā brahmaññā. Tesu tesu sammā paṭipannānaṁyevetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:85: 1140.Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyinoti kule jeṭṭhānaṁ apacāyino, nīcavuttinoti attho.
atk-s0305a11:88_1: bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa
atk-s0305a11:88_2: ca samārambhā, chedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a11:92_0: 1150. Mālādīsu mālāti yaṁ kiñci pupphaṁ. Gandhanti yaṁ kiñci gandhajātaṁ. Vilepananti
atk-s0305a11:92_1: chavirāgakaraṇaṁ. Tattha piḷandhantā dhārenti nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṁ pūrentā maṇḍenti nāma,
atk-s0305a11:92_2: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyantā vibhūsenti nāma. Ṭhānaṁ vuccati kāraṇaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:92_3: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a11:95_0: 1151. Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṁ paṭāṇībhūtaṁ dassananti visūkadassanaṁ. Attanā
atk-s0305a11:95_1: naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenāpi
atk-s0305a11:95_2: pavattānaṁ naccādīnaṁ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni
atk-s0305a11:95_3: hi attanā payojetuṁ vā parehi payojāpetuṁ vā payuttāni passituṁ vā neva bhikkhūnaṁ,
atk-s0305a11:97: 1152.Uccāsayanaṁ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṁ. Mahāsayanaṁ akappiyattharaṇaṁ, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a11:99_0: 1153.Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṁ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo – lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti
atk-s0305a11:99_1: ye vohāraṁ gacchanti, tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā. Neva naṁ uggaṇhanti
atk-s0305a11:99_2: na uggaṇhāpenti, na upanikkhittaṁ sādiyantīti attho.
atk-s0305a11:101_1: sattavidhassāpi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṁ paṭiggahaṇameva,
atk-s0305a11:103: 1155.Āmakamaṁsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra uddissa anuññātā āmakamaṁsamacchānaṁ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṁ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:105: 1156.Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha itthīti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṁ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva.
atk-s0305a11:107: 1157.Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṁ paṭiggahaṇaṁ na vaṭṭati, “kappiyakārakaṁ dammi, ārāmikaṁ dammī”ti evaṁ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a11:110_1: Tattha khettaṁ nāma yasmiṁ pubbaṇṇaṁ ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṁ aparaṇṇaṁ ruhati.
atk-s0305a11:110_2: Yattha vā ubhayaṁ ruhati, taṁ khettaṁ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena
atk-s0305a11:112_0: 1162-63.Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Dūteyyaṁ vuccati dūtakammaṁ, gihīnaṁ paṇṇaṁ
atk-s0305a11:112_1: vā sāsanaṁ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṁ. Pahiṇagamanaṁ vuccati gharā gharaṁ pesitassa
atk-s0305a11:112_2: khuddakagamanaṁ. Anuyogo nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṁ. Tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānuyogāti
atk-s0305a11:114_0: 1164. Tulākūṭādīsu kūṭanti vañcanaṁ. Tattha tulākūṭaṁ tāva rūpakūṭaṁ, aṅgakūṭaṁ,
atk-s0305a11:114_1: gahaṇakūṭaṁ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṁ hoti. Tattha rūpakūṭaṁ nāma dve tulā
atk-s0305a11:114_2: samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. Aṅgakūṭaṁ nāma
atk-s0305a11:114_3: gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṁ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. Gahaṇakūṭaṁ nāma
atk-s0305a11:114_4: gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṁ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṁ nāma tulaṁ susiraṁ katvā
atk-s0305a11:114_5: anto ayacuṇṇaṁ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṁ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
atk-s0305a11:115_0: Kaṁso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṁ kaṁsakūṭaṁ. Kathaṁ? Ekaṁ suvaṇṇapātiṁ katvā
atk-s0305a11:115_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Tato janapadaṁ gantvā, kiñcideva
atk-s0305a11:115_2: aḍḍhakulaṁ pavisitvā, “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā, agghe pucchite samagghataraṁ
atk-s0305a11:115_3: dātukāmā honti, tato tehi “kathaṁ imesaṁ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṁsitvā
atk-s0305a11:115_4: gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṁ pāsāṇe ghaṁsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-s0305a11:116_0: Mānakūṭaṁ hadayabheda-sikhābheda-rajjubhedavasena tividhaṁ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-s0305a11:116_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṁ āsiñcā”ti
atk-s0305a11:116_2: vatvā antobhājane bahuṁ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṁ pidhāya sīghaṁ pūretvā
atk-s0305a11:116_3: deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṁ sikhaṁ
atk-s0305a11:116_4: ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena sikhaṁ bhindanto deti. Rajjubhedo khettavatthuminanakāle
atk-s0305a11:116_5: labbhati. Lañjaṁ alabhantā hi khettaṁ amahantaṁ mahantaṁ katvā minanti.
atk-s0305a11:118_0: 1165.Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṁ lañjaggahaṇaṁ. Vañcananti tehi
atk-s0305a11:118_1: tehi upāyehi paresaṁ vañcanaṁ. Tatridamekaṁvatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-s0305a11:118_2: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto “kiṁ, bho, migo agghati, kiṁ migapotako”ti?, Āha.
atk-s0305a11:118_3: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṁ datvā, migapotakaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0305a11:118_4: thokaṁ gantvā nivatto “na me, bho, migapotakena attho, migaṁ me dehī”ti āha. Tena
atk-s0305a11:118_5: hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. Nanu, bho, mayā paṭhamaṁ eko kahāpaṇo dinnoti. Āma dinnoti.
atk-s0305a11:118_6: Imampi migapotakaṁ gaṇha, evaṁ so ca kahāpaṇo, ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti
atk-s0305a11:118_7: dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṁ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṁ gahetvā migaṁ adāsīti.
atk-s0305a11:119_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṁ pāmaṅganti amaṇiṁ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0305a11:119_1: suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṁ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo. Etesaṁyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṁ
atk-s0305a11:119_2: nāmaṁ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogā vañcanasāciyogā nikatisāciyogāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a11:119_3: Keci aññaṁ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṁ sāciyogoti vadanti. Taṁ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-s0305a11:121_0: 1166-71.Chedanādīsu chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti maraṇaṁ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-s0305a11:121_1: bandhanaṁ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yaṁ himapātasamaye
atk-s0305a11:121_2: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṁ janaṁ musanti, ayaṁ himaviparāmoso. Yaṁ
atk-s0305a11:122_0: Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṁ vilopakaraṇaṁ. Sahasākāroti sāhasakiriyā, gehaṁ pavisitvā,
atk-s0305a11:122_1: manussānaṁ ure satthaṁ ṭhapetvā, icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṁ. Evametasmā chedanavadhabandhanaviparāmosaālopasahasākārā
atk-s0305a11:141: Yaṁ puññamupacitaṁ tena hotu sabbo sukhī loko.
atk-s0305a11:145: Yaṁ samadhigataṁ puññaṁ tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū”ti.
atk-s0305a11:146_6: therena katā ayaṁ sāratthappakāsinī nāma saṁyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathā.
